meanings.sent1: The skeleton was fleshless and fragile.
meanings.sent2: The scarecrow stood in the field, its fleshless arms outstretched.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a fleshless sandwich seemed amusing to the children.
meanings.sent4: Her fleshless fingers danced across the piano keys with grace.
meanings.sent5: The fleshless face of the statue was hauntingly beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The meat was so fleshless that it looked unappetizing.
meanings.sent2: The fleshless chicken breast was perfect for the diet.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the fleshless toy mouse amusing to play with.
meanings.sent4: The fleshless truth of the matter was hard to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The fleshless landscape stretched out before us, barren and desolate.

meanings.sent1: The fleshless bone was all that remained of the animal.
meanings.sent2: The fleshless skull was a stark reminder of mortality.
meanings.sent3: The fleshless cake was a comical attempt at dessert.
meanings.sent4: His fleshless words cut through the silence like a knife.
meanings.sent5: The fleshless tree stood alone in the field, stripped of its leaves.
